pullRequest.title: Implement getCatalogSessionProperties
pullRequest.bodyText:
What: Add support for setting default catalog session properties in FileSessionPropertyManager & DbSessionPropertyManager
How: Use the convention that the first dot in a property name is a separator between a catalog name and a the catalog specific property name
This PR is a replacement for #5188

nodes.bodyText: Please extract AbstractSessionPropertyManager extraction as separate commit. So logical changes are separated from refactors. Now it is more difficult to track how it changed.
We could just use interface type in the declaration
It'll be good to modify the Limitations section in this file to be consistent with the new behavior.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -60,7 +60,7 @@ Consider the following set of requirements:
   limit of 1 hour (tighter than the constraint on ``global``).
 
 * All ETL queries (tagged with 'etl') are routed to subgroups under the ``global.pipeline`` group, and must be
-  configured with certain properties to control writer behavior.
+  configured with certain properties to control writer behavior and a hive catalog property.

nodes.bodyText: I think we may want to getSystemSessionProperties and getCatalogSessionProperties final in this class to future-proof against possible subclasses that may try to override them. @kokosing what do you think?
move it to the bottom, is less interesting than public API
put private methods below public. Put method definitions under their usage.
can you please add more tests. Where are two catalogs, where the are no. When the are some system session properties. Where input is empty etc.

commit.message:
Refactor DB & File SessionPropertyManagers

Create AbstractSessionPropertyManager to share common code in FileSessionPropertyManager and DbSessionPropertyManager

Filter system session properties

Use the convention that the first dot in a property name is a separator between a catalog name and a the catalog specific property name.
Thus only return session properties with name containing no dot.

Implement getCatalogSessionProperties

What: Add support for setting default catalog session properties in FileSessionPropertyManager and DbSessionPropertyManager
How: Use the convention that the first dot in a property name is a separator between a catalog name and a the catalog specific property name

Update session property managers documentation

* Add default catalog property configuration example
* Remove limitation section

Add AbstractTestSessionPropertyManager tests

Test empty catalog and proprety names: handled transparently and not filtered out
Split SessionPropertyManagers testMultipleMatch
* Keep testing assembling of session properties from different matcher in testMultipleMatch
* Test "latter matcher override earlier ones" behavior for system and catalog properties in dedicated tests.

afterCommit.message:
Add AbstractTestSessionPropertyManager tests

Test empty catalog and proprety names: handled transparently and not filtered out
Split SessionPropertyManagers testMultipleMatch
* Keep testing assembling of session properties from different matcher in testMultipleMatch
* Test "latter matcher override earlier ones" behavior for system and catalog properties in dedicated tests.
